text:
Getting children back to school safely in the fall is a high priority for North Carolina. Today, state education & health leaders released a set of guidelines for public schools to follow to lower the risk of COVID-19 spread for students, staff & families.
https://t.co/nTcxaFeZlg https://t.co/auDKYMjMsU
